metadata.title: Privacy policy | CostaSpanish Academy
metadata.description: Information about the processing of personal data.

title: Privacy policy
intro: In accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR), users are informed about the processing of their personal data.

data.title: Processed data
data.p1: Personal data provided by users through contact or pre-enrollment forms are collected.
data.p2: Data may include name, email address, language level and any information voluntarily provided.

purpose.title: Purpose of processing
purpose.p1: Data are used to manage information requests, pre-enrollments, group creation and academic communications.

legalBasis.title: Legal basis
legalBasis.p1: The legal basis for data processing is the user’s explicit consent.

retention.title: Data retention
retention.p1: Data will be kept for as long as necessary to fulfill the purpose for which they were collected or until deletion is requested.

rights.title: User rights
rights.p1: Users may exercise their rights of access, rectification, erasure, objection, restriction and data portability.
rights.p2: Requests can be sent to the email address provided above.

security.title: Security measures
security.p1: Appropriate technical and organizational measures are applied to ensure the security of personal data.
